channel.title: Blue Ridge Boost
channel.description: Recent content on Blue Ridge Boost

item.title: Afternoon Camp for 9-12 year olds
item.description: Camp at a glance When: Dec 27 - Dec 31, 2021, 2pm-4pm. Where: 1629 Appian Way, Charlottesville, Virginia. What: Coding instruction without video games using Python and CoffeScript. Cost: $350. Conditions to attend: proof of COVID-19 vaccination, commitment to wear a safe mask correctly for the duration of the camp. Daily Schedule Campers will spend two hours daily, from 2m to 4pm working together and individually on fun programming challenges.

item.title: Classes
item.description: In January and February, we offer week-end enrichment classes of up to 4 students. Sign-up for as many as you like. Payment is required to reserve spot, no walk-ins accepted. Competition Math for Fourth and Fifth Graders When: TODO Where: 1629 Appian Way, Charlottesville, Virginia. What: Problem solving strategies for elementary school math competitions, focused on MOEMS. Cost: $40/session. Conditions to attend: proof of COVID-19 vaccination, commitment to wear a safe mask correctly for the duration of the camp.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you Please contact us with for any tutoring needs in math and computing.

item.title: Morning Camp for 6-9 year olds
item.description: Camp at a glance When: Monday, December 27 - Friday, December 31, 2021, 10:00 am â€“ 1:00 pm Where: 1629 Appian Way, Charlottesville, Virginia (Pantops area) What: Coding instruction using block languages (not video games!) Cost: $350 (early drop off at 9am is available for an additional $50) Sign Up: nora@cvillemath.comConditions to attend: proof of COVID-19 vaccination, commitment to wear a mask for the duration of the camp. Daily Schedule Campers will spend three hours daily, from 10am to 1pm working as a group and individually on fun programming challenges.

item.title: Tutoring
item.description: We offer 1-1 tutoring for students from middle school to graduate student level in Mathematics and Computer Science. The cost per class is between $50 and $150 depedning on the complexity of the preparation and materials needed. For a quote and scheduling, please contact us at TODO.
